item.title: Paypal Express Checkout NVP API
item.description: I’m not sure why Paypal has written documentation, regarding its own Express Checkout name-value-pair API, with no enthusiasm at all. The classes used with the Paypal API are extremely easy to use. All of this is likely contributing to the confusion about using Express Checkout. But Iâ€™m here now, to save your application, and hopefully your sanity.
